question: I had preeclampsia in my first pregnancy and my 2 year old was born with 34 weeks, he is a healthy, wonderfull boy. Im on my 25 w of my second expectinga girl but i cant stop worrying about my blood pressure going up again. I feel  lonely and dont feel like talking about itwith family or friends becuase they say im too anxiuos
title: preeclampsia
